html:
Nov 4 (Reuters) - GFH FINANCIAL GROUP GFHB.BH:: *ANNOUNCE ACQUISITION OF A PORTFOLIO OF AMAZON DESIGNATED LOGISTICS WAREHOUSES IN UNITED STATES *INVESTMENT LEVERAGES ONGOING GROWTH AND EXPANSION OF E-COMMERCE IN THE US *ACQUIRES A $2 BILLION PORTFOLIO OF AMAZON DESIGNATED LOGISTICS WAREHOUSES IN THE US *INVESTMENT MADE BY GFH IN PARTNERSHIP WITH PREYLOCK HOLDINGS, ALONGSIDE A CLUB OF MULTI-NATIONAL INSTITUTIONAL INVESTMENT FIRMS


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 04-NOV-202104:24:45.103 GMT
